name: PM10
description: Concentration of particulate matter with a diameter of 10 micrometers or less in the air.

name: PM2_5
description: Concentration of fine particulate matter with a diameter of 2.5 micrometers or less in the air.

name: CARBON_MONOXIDE
description: Concentration of carbon monoxide (CO) in the air.

name: CARBON_DIOXIDE
description: Concentration of carbon dioxide (CO₂) in the air.

name: NITROGEN_DIOXIDE
description: Concentration of nitrogen dioxide (NO₂), mainly emitted from traffic and fuel combustion.

name: SULPHUR_DIOXIDE
description: Concentration of sulphur dioxide (SO₂), primarily emitted by industrial processes and fossil fuel combustion.

name: OZONE
description: Concentration of tropospheric ozone (O₃), formed by photochemical reactions in the atmosphere.

name: AMMONIA
description: Concentration of ammonia (NH₃), mainly originating from agricultural activities and livestock farming.

name: METHANE
description: Concentration of methane (CH₄), a greenhouse gas emitted from agriculture, waste, and industrial sources.

name: AEROSOL_OPTICAL_DEPTH
description: Aerosol Optical Depth (AOD), a dimensionless measure of the amount of aerosol particles in the atmosphere.

name: DUST
description: Concentration of mineral dust particles suspended in the atmosphere.

name: UV_INDEX
description: UV Index indicating the level of ultraviolet radiation at the Earth's surface based on the WHO scale.

name: UV_INDEX_CLEAR_SKY
description: UV Index under clear-sky conditions without cloud cover, based on the WHO scale.
